schema.name: mAdminState
schema.summary: Set the administrative state of this configuration.
schema.label: Enable administrative state
schema.hoverhelp: <p>Set the administrative state of the configuration.</p><ul><li>To make active, set the check box.</li><li>To make inactive, clear the check box.</li></ul>
schema.description: <p>The administrative state of the configuration.</p><ul><li>To make active, set to enabled.</li><li>To make inactive, set to disabled.</li></ul>
A descriptive summary for the configuration.
schema.summary: Enter a descriptive summary for the configuration.
schema.name: UserSummary
ReadOnly
schema.summary: Set the access permission to files on the storage volume.
schema.hoverhelp: <p>Set the access permission to files on the storage volume.</p><ul><li>When enabled, access permission is read-only. On appliances with the B2B feature, access permission must be read/write, the appliance will ignore this setting if B2B feature enabled.</li><li>When disabled, the default value, access permission is read/write.</li></ul>
schema.description: <p>The access permission to files on the storage volume.</p><ul><li>When enabled, access permission is read-only. On appliances with the B2B feature, access permission must be read/write, the appliance will ignore this setting if B2B feature enabled.</li><li>When disabled, the default value, access permission is read/write.</li></ul>

schema.name: Directory
schema.summary: Enter the name of the subdirectory.
schema.hoverhelp: Enter the name of the subdirectory where the files on the storage volume are available. The name can be up to 64 characters long. The name cannot start with a period. The name can use all alphanumeric characters and the following special characters: . - _.
schema.description: The subdirectory where the files on the storage volume are available. The name can be up to 64 characters long. The name cannot start with a period. The name can use all alphanumeric characters and the following special characters: . - _.
